title: t206 hof blowout sale all sold
author: Econteachert205

posts.post_title: t206 hof blowout sale all sold
posts.post_content:
Sold....Funding a purchase outside the hobby.  The pictures were taken outside with a camera, thus the sometimes faded appearance.  These cards are all g/f/p with pretty good eye appeal.  Shipping is 3 bucks no matter how many you buy.  Paypal preferred.  Here is a description by plastic sheet with prices.

Sheet 1

Merkle throwing polar bear: 25 
Leifield batting top name only: 20
Kelley old mill, creased and pencil on back: 22
Chase trophy, pin hole: 20
Arrelanes cycle, no crease: 43

Sheet 2

Chase port pink sweet cap: 23
Hoffman old mill: 16
Hoffman piedmont, paper loss: 13
Doyle Polar Bear extra dot, creased: 38
Doyle sweet cap, big crease: 25
Durham, faded sweet cap back with paper loss: 22
Taylor: pinhole: 22
Jennings sweet cap 350-460, pinhole: 30

Sheet 3
Wallace port pied name in pencil on back: 22
Evers port creased: 40
Marquard port erased pencil: 33
Griffith port, pretty good: 33
Bender port, piedmont, 30
Willis port, creased: 28

I think I have these priced to move, make an offer on them all if you wish.

Pm on durham, chase pink sweet cap, kelley om and willis portrait

Sent from my SCH-S968C using Tapatalk

I will take them all, if they're not gone already.  Otherwise, will take just:

Merkle throwing polar bear: 25 
Kelley old mill, creased and pencil on back: 22
Doyle sweet cap, big crease: 25
Durham, faded sweet cap back with paper loss: 22
Jennings sweet cap 350-460, pinhole: 30
Wallace port pied name in pencil on back: 22
Evers port creased: 40
Griffith port, pretty good: 33
Willis port, creased: 28
If Paul isn't taking them all I will take the Doyle Polar Bear with the extra dot.
Answering messages as received.  Cards are pending...
I will gladly take whatever HOF'ers that are left.

No doubt!  Feeding frenzy :)  Nice lot/prices, Dennis.  No worries on funding your purchase here :)
